Name: Core Passive: Pre-Driven Needle
Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
Descriptions: When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume all stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color>, increasing the accumulated <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color> by <color=#2BAD00>65%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the next <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect inflicted on the target increases <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG by 18%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per skill use. Resets when the <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> effect ends.

When Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy and deals <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> (up to 8 stacks). Cons.Name: Recharge Chamber
Cons.Effect:
When the 4th hit of Grace's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, all squad members gain 0.25 Energy.
Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to all squad members.

Cons.Name: Lightning Piercer
Cons.Effect: When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup RES</color> is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.

Cons.Name: Burst Capacitor
Cons.Effect: When Grace uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> hits an enemy, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing her Energy Generation Rate of the attack by 20%.

Cons.Name: Detonation Trigger
Cons.Effect: When all <color=#FFFFFF>Zap</color> stacks are consumed to activate a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, Grace's skill is enhanced, tossing an extra grenade and increasing each grenade's DMG to 200%.
